reviews.review: The people who play this game are some of the most retarded incompetent people I have ever had the displeasure of meeting.
O jogo é ótimo, duro que vicia muito e tem muito hacker.

The game has mechanics that make it easy to spend huge amounts of time getting better at it. You probably want to play it with a group of friends. The community found in the solo matching queues is not perfect, sometimes people play music, shout at each other or call you their ♥♥♥♥♥, but sometimes you find sociable golden nuggets. It's mostly silent.
Jogo muito bom, com há de se esperar.
Great up until you get kicked for being bad
Stuck at silver 1 with 4k hours gameplay. :)
Ce jeu n'est pas un "Dead Game"
Игра в которой ты узнаешь: свой интеллектуальный уровень, кто твой батя и твоя мать(+в какой канаве они находятся) и кем ты родился. Класс, ставлю 10/10
There are more CHEATERS in this game than you may think
Its honestly pretty fun. I didnt like it while i was a noob, (im kinda still one, but im a pro noob) but now its much more fun
покатать пойдёт, но читеров развелось, а вальве ничего с этим не делает. и да, доната много.
Konge spil ;) meget social anlagt med spille stilen

BU OYUN BOZUK BOZUK BOZUK VE FPS İMİ YİYOR DİYE ARAK PLANDAKİ PANAROMA GÖRÜNTÜLERİNİ KAPATIYORUM OYUNDAN ATIYOR AMK GABEN'I OYUNU BOZMUŞ HİLECİLERDEN GEÇİLMEZ OLMUŞ BU OYUN KİMSE İNDİRİP OYNAMASIN HİÇ KİMSE BUNA PARA HARCAMASIN BOŞU BOŞUNA HİÇ KİMSEYE TAVSİYE  ET Mİ YO RUM !!!!!!
Простой, популярный шутер каждому по душе!
good game and a lot of people accuse me of hacking which is dumb af LMFAO they just suck
Если у тебе стальные  нервы тебе сюда  каждая 2 катка в парйм с читами браво валв
The game is very nice, lots of action, and nice gamemodes. LOVE IT!!
gostaria de expor minha indignação pelo cs-go por sua falta de atitude em pró do jogo, possibilitando o facil acesso de xiters e programas de auxilio sem ao menos querer uma total mudança de jogo
это игра чисто на часок. Сюжета ноль ИИ устарел соболезную тем людям которые наиграли больше 100 часов в эту игру ибо реально у вас проблемы с башкой
Зашел в игру, набрал другу, 30 минут настраивали что бы я мог зайти в бой, зашел, сыграл 2 раунда меня оскорбили и убили . 10 Бомбил из 10
nice game but many cheaters now
игра идите в ж о пу
Great game, very fun with friends and great community!
мине нравица игра хочу чтоби ви сняли мине ваг бан габен ( игра говно)0)))) )

I personally believe that the Counter-Strike Franchise was the best fps shooter games ever released. I believe that because not only are they lots of fun but they allow you to improve in many others games because of your cs gameplay.
Советую игру! Но если бы улучшили античит была бы моей любимой игрой
Old but gold günlere kanser olarak geri dönüyoruz

Bad Anti Cheat lots of cheaters on free CounterStrike only get it if you are gonna play Faceit or Esportal

Most addictive game in the world!
tough game but deffinitely worth the experience
